arts.ttl: Sunderland in picture to sign player with Championship experience – Club preparing for January exit
arts.sum: Sunderland could bring Glen Kamara back to the Championship in the winter market, just months after he left Leeds United. The defensive midfielder spent one season at Leeds United before Stade Rennais secured his services in the summer window.
